title: Gargantuan if True
author: VD
content_html:
It has been alleged that Pennsylvania governor Joshua Shapiro was involved somehow in the assassination attempt on President Trump.

President Donald Trump learned today a Federal Whistleblower and former PA State Police employee has come forward with information and filed a criminal complaint this week on February 7, 2025, allegedly linking Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro with the assassination attempt in Butler, Pennsylvania.

Allegations from the private criminal complaint: “In the weeks leading up to the Trump Rally, President Joseph R. Biden, made frequent visits to Defendant Joshua Shapiro to discuss the obstacle faced by the Democratic party. Joshua Shapiro, organized, schemed, and conspired with other officials to carry out the attempted assassination against Former President Donald J. Trump.”

On the one hand, it’s very hard to believe that a sitting governor would dare to conspire against the life of a Presidential candidate. On the other hand, we know that the Deep State has done this sort of thing for decades, and some of its known conspiracies have involved state and local politicians in the past.

DISCUSS ON SG

President Donald Trump learned today a Federal Whistleblower and former PA State Police employee has come forward with information and filed a criminal complaint this week on February 7, 2025, allegedly linking Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro with the assassination attempt in Butler, Pennsylvania.
Allegations from the private criminal complaint: “In the weeks leading up to the Trump Rally, President Joseph R. Biden, made frequent visits to Defendant Joshua Shapiro to discuss the obstacle faced by the Democratic party. On the one hand, it’s very hard to believe that a sitting governor would dare to conspire against the life of a Presidential candidate.
